title: Climate change and the economics of the world's fisheries : examples of small pelagic stocks
abstract: Contents: Climate Change and the Economics of the World's Fisheries: An Introduction Manuel Barange, Roegnvaldur Hannesson and Samuel F. Herrick Jr 1.
